data.title: ARi - Producer/DJ/Singer/Songwriter - Los Angeles
data.meta_description: Producer/DJ/Singer/Songwriter ARi - Listen to samples, read reviews, learn more, contact. Read interview with ARi, see credits and hire
data.text:
With over 4 million views on YouTube (@MetasinMusic), my music has resonated with listeners around the world, blending lyrics that make you question your existence with melodies that get stuck in your brain all day.

Whether it's a moody R&B song, or a head-bobbing, driving Melodic Techno record, I will create you one-of-a-kind lyrics for your project with my signature haunting, ethereal sound that tells a story and evokes emotion.

Aside from my own indie projects, I have ghost written for others for years, as well as scored and written + sang for TV and film.

My solo projects are Progressive House, Deep Trance, Melodic Techno and Dance/Electronic, so I know this lane *really* well.

Other genres I have experience writing for: Dark R&B, HipHop, SynthPop, SynthWave, Cinematic/Film, Indie-Dance

Artists that inspire me: Eric Prydz, Zhu, Mike Dean, The Weeknd, Cristoph, Giol√≠ & Assia, Grimes, Naomi Sharon, Sade

RATES:

Vocals start at $350

THE PROCESS:

- Send me your project/instrumental and we'll discuss your vision for it

- I get to work connecting with your piece, writing to it + recording the vocals

- I will comp and clean vocals before I send.

- You will receive both the dry and wet stems.

- Fast delivery!

- Rushed 48 hr delivery available for a small fee.

TERMS & CONDITIONS:

- One free revision ($50 per revision afterwards)

- Non-refundable deposit (50% of the total)

- You are not paying for a feature, just vocals, unless we verbally agree upon otherwise

- Do not include me as primary or secondary artist upon distributing with your label/DistroKid

I'd love to hear about your project. Click the 'Contact' button above to get in touch.
